
# American Tourister

I have created the UI of the front page of the American Tourister website with the help of HTML and CSS ,And for some fonts and icons i use Google font , Bootstrap icons and Font Awesome.
So...American Tourister American tourister luggage makers who sell luggage online on their website and their brand ambassador is Virat Kohli who is a legendary cricketer of India.At the top of the website, we have put a bar of all time offer  of the company. then i Created a nav bar below that which has three parts first company logo second menu bar and then user login section Then after that started the main section, in which the company's products were shown through the slider with the image of the brand Ambassador on top. After that, the company's product variety and their price tags were shown through different sections and the company's vision was told through quotes. And by creating a footer at the end of the page, all the information of the company in different divisions through tags like support, payment method, social media, handles ,terms and conditions, policy etc.


## 

 I use Maximum number of tags and Properties , i fully try to make Responsive but i need practice, i can't make fully resposive but i use in somes tags responsive properties and it definately gives breaks. i try to make it Exactly same and 90% i do it except resposiveness
